JSPF API

Packages
net.xeoh.plugins.base Contains the core plugin manager classes.
net.xeoh.plugins.base.annotations Core annotations for plugins.
net.xeoh.plugins.base.annotations.configuration Annotations related to plugin loading.
net.xeoh.plugins.base.annotations.events Annoations related to plugin events.
net.xeoh.plugins.base.annotations.injections Annotations related to injecting variables.
net.xeoh.plugins.base.annotations.meta Annotations related to plugin information.
net.xeoh.plugins.base.impl The PluginManagerFactory is the framework's entry point and the only class of relevance within this package, start exploring here.
net.xeoh.plugins.base.options Top level package for core options.
net.xeoh.plugins.base.options.addpluginsfrom Options to addPluginsFrom().
net.xeoh.plugins.base.options.getplugin Options to getPlugin().
net.xeoh.plugins.base.util Some utilities and wrappers for other objects / interfaces.
net.xeoh.plugins.base.util.uri Utilities for URIs.
net.xeoh.plugins.informationbroker Top level package for the information broker.
net.xeoh.plugins.informationbroker.options Top level package for information broker options.
net.xeoh.plugins.informationbroker.options.publish Options to publish().
net.xeoh.plugins.informationbroker.options.subscribe Options to subscribe().
net.xeoh.plugins.informationbroker.util Utils for various InformationBroker classes and objects.
